name: Space Outlaw Alice
description:
Space Outlaw Alice

Space Outlaw Alice is a retro game that brings together two different genres. The game follows the main character, the outlaw Alice, as she gets targeted by the corrupt government of the Earth Union and needs to deal with mysterious extra-dimensional monsters that appeared out of nowhere. As she runs through the stages, the player will experience a classic platform action with a lot of jumping and shooting. However, when the time comes to pilot Seraph, her giant robot, the game will shift to a horizontal shoot'em up with even more shooting. Space Outlaw Alice is highly inspired by the classic games of the Famicom video game console and the mecha anime genre. Its plot and characters are carefully presented through 8-bit cutscenes between the stages.

History

The year is 2378 A.D. Humanity is already expanding into space, but its progress is being held back by the corrupt regulation of Earth Union. In addition to the inability to rely on its own government, both Earth and space are plagued by criminal activities and terrorist attacks. Alice, fearless outlaw and captain of the spaceship Valiant Gear, accepts a job to raid a military facility and gets caught up in a situation that will determine the fate of the world. Targeted by the Earth Union army and facing the coming of extra-dimensional creatures that threatens to exterminate all forms of life, she and her crew will need to make a decision. Run and mind their own business or join the battle and help everyone?

Features
  • Retro platform action
  • Retro shoot’em up action (with giant robots and monsters!)
  • 2d pixel art graphics inspired by the Famicom videogame console
  • Awesome upbeat 8-bit music
  • Hidden weapons, upgrades and routes
  • Special attacks for when things get rough
  • 8-bit cutscenes presenting an engaging plot
  • Strong female lead
Release

Space Outlaw Alice is scheduled for a Q3 2019 release on Windows PCs.
